# MPRepeatType.one

**Case**

A single item is repeated indefinitely.

## Declaration

```swift
case one
```

## Repeat types

- **MPRepeatType.off**: Nothing is repeated during playback.
- **MPRepeatType.all**: The current container or playlist is repeated indefinitely.

items.description: The current container or playlist is repeated indefinitely.
items.name: MPRepeatType.all
